timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-28T10:48:14", "sender_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "kateggkoufa@gmail.com", "subject": "Request for Guarantor Details & WhatsApp Communication \u2013 UCL Accommodation Booking", "message": "Hello Aikaterini ,\\n\\nI hope you're doing well!\\n\\nTo proceed with your accommodation booking, we kindly request you to share your guarantor's details at your earliest convenience. Please provide the following:\\n\\n-\\nFull Name\\n\\n-\\nEmail Address\\n\\n-\\nContact Number\\n\\n-\\nDate of Birth\\n\\n-\\nFull Address\\n\\n-\\nYour Relationship to the Guarantor\\n\\nAlso, we noticed that you haven\u2019t been active on WhatsApp. As we\u2019re currently processing your booking and may need to coordinate quickly, it would be great if you could connect with us there as well. It will help ensure a smoother and faster process.\\n\\nAs the official accommodation partner for UCL, we\u2019re here to make your housing journey stress-free and seamless.\\n\\nLooking forward to your response!\\n\\nBest regards,\\nRishabh Mishra\\nAmber Student\\n\\n--\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hello Aikaterini , I hope you're doing well! To proceed with your accommodation booking, we kindly request you to share your guarantor's details at your earliest convenience. Please provide the", "direction": "outbound", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "kateggkoufa@gmail.com"}

{"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-28T17:39:17", "sender_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "kateggkoufa@gmail.com", "subject": "Contact details Required", "message": "Hello Aikaterini GKOUFA,\\n\\nCould you please share your WhatsApp details so we can connect regarding your booking at UCL accommodation?\\n\\nThanks,\\nRishabh\\n\\n--\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hello Aikaterini GKOUFA, Could you please share your WhatsApp details so we can connect regarding your booking at UCL accommodation? Thanks, Rishabh -- Rishabh M Senior Operation Associate Phone: +", "direction": "outbound", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "kateggkoufa@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello.
Speaker A: Hi.
Speaker B: Yeah, hi, am I speaking with Agathri near?
Speaker A: Yes, that's me.
Speaker B: Yeah, this is actually calling you from Amber Student, and this call is regarding your student accommodation.
Speaker A: I'm sorry, from where are you calling?
Speaker B: It's. I'm calling you from Amber Student. We are the official student accommodation partner for University College London. I can see that you're looking to book a student accommodation, correct. By the name of. Yes, I.Q. wilbur, London. So I just wanted to confirm, like. Yeah, tell me.
Speaker A: No, sorry, continue.
Speaker B: So actually we have received your booking form. I have received all the details, but I haven't received the deposit amount yet. I can see that you have tried to make the payment like for so many times. Like have tried for five or six times. But the payment didn't gone through, correct?
Speaker A: No, I haven't proceeded with the payment because I'm still considering a few options and I have arranged a few viewings as well. So I'm still. I'm still thinking it through right now.
Speaker B: Okay, that's not an issue. You can have the waiving whenever you wish to proceed ahead with the property. You can just let up the Twitter. No. And then I'll be able to provide you some cash back and along with that we will be able to proceed ahead with the booking as well. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: But I have been. I have, I have, I have been trying to reach out to you on WhatsApp but not able to. Can you please confirm? Like it's just number or like.
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah. So yes, it is a different phone number. So it's plus 352 plus 352. 6611 9, 2.
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: 51 4.
Speaker B: Let me repeat that for you. It's 3, 5, 2, double 6, double 1, 9, 2, 51 4. Is it?
Speaker A: Yeah, the 352 is the country code. Yeah.
Speaker B: So I have just dropped you on. Hello, can you please check?
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah.
Speaker B: So I'll do one thing here. You can just let me know whichever property that you wish to schedule, whichever property that you wish to view, and I'll be able to assist you with that.
Speaker A: All right. Okay, great.
Speaker B: Okay, bye.
Speaker A: Okay, thank you so much.
